pr_title: HBASE-25176 MasterStoppedException should be moved to hbase-client module

timeline.bodyText: Maybe we should declare it as IA.Public? What is the IA annotation for other exceptions under this package?
timeline.author: Apache9

+import org.apache.yetus.audience.InterfaceAudience;
+
+/**
+ * Thrown when the master is stopped
+ */

replies.bodyText: I think we have mixed IA for these classes, but yes I also believe that MasterStoppedException should be IA.Public.
replies.author: virajjasani

replies.bodyText:
In general, I think user could catch MasterStoppedException and process it, but we do not expect user to create a MasterStoppedException right? The downside of IA.Public is that, we can not change the constructors of this exception any more...
Maybe we should have a IA.LimitedPrivate for exceptions?
replies.author: Apache9

replies.bodyText:
We do not construct or catch MasterStoppedException in client side now,  so I use IA.Private.
And yes, It should be IA.Public, and IA.LimitedPrivate is better
replies.author: nyl3532016
